title: Pop Culture Happy Hour Bridge Of Spies And Lots More Tom Hanks
text:
Pop Culture Happy Hour: 'Bridge Of Spies' And Lots More Tom Hanks 
NPR Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Subscribe to Pop Culture Happy Hour 
We're always pleased as punch when Audie Cornish of All Things Considered joins us in historic Studio 44, and this week, she's here for our talk about...
